## ðŸ”’ Building Continuum - Chap. 1 - Why I started

This chapter explains why Continuum began â€” not as a startup idea, but as a quiet response to friction. What began as a few signed notes on Nostr evolved into a deeper realization about authorship, ownership, dependency, and local-first infrastructure. â€œWhy I Startedâ€ is not about ambition; it is about coherence.
